{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-XU |revision=(2GB) |price=149 |est_release_date=08/2013 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=Exynos 5410;Exynos 5 Octa, 5410 (N5VA1011); |cpu1_cspeed=1.2-1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=8 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=PoP |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9730 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=Micro HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort, MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, RTC w/ battery backup, Audio out (3.5mm), GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2012.07; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.91;Ubuntu Precise; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=odroid |default_pass=odroid }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-XU}}
eMMC module connector for eMMC4.5 modules :of 8GB, 16GB and 32GB available. RAM is LPDDR3 PoP with processor
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/old_product/odroid-xu ''ODROID-XU'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2013/08/01/149-hardkernel-odroid-xu-octa-core-big-little-development-board/ ''Hardkernel ODROID-XU'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Samsung]] ''Exynos'' 5410 (5 Octa) :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @1.6GHz + :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.2GHz *GPU: PowerVR SGX544 MP3 *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 4.5 connector *RAM: 2GB LPDDR3 @800MHz
===See also=== *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU
